games.title: Lol
games.description: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game, in which the player controls a character.

games.title: Cs-Go
games.description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game developed by Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment.

games.title: Valo
games.description: Valorant (stylized as VALORANT) is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical first-person hero shooter developed and published by Riot Games, for Microsoft Windows.

games.title: Dota
games.description: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) video game developed and published by Valve.
